entity.name: Loading
entity.description: General issues related to loading page subresources like scripts, stylesheets, and modules, preloading, or loading UX.
entity.descriptionHtml: General issues related to loading page subresources like scripts, stylesheets, and modules, preloading, or loading UX.
entity.descriptionClean: General issues related to loading page subresources like scripts, stylesheets, and modules, preloading, or loading UX.

entity.name: Lazy Loading
entity.description: Issues related to the native `loading="lazy"` attribute for images and iframes, and the desire for similar functionality for other elements.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues related to the native loading="lazy" attribute for images and iframes, and the desire for similar functionality for other elements.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues related to the native loading="lazy" attribute for images and iframes, and the desire for similar functionality for other elements.

example.codeHighlighted: <img src="picture.jpg" loading="lazy" /> <iframe src="supplementary.html" loading="lazy"></iframe>

resources.title: Browser-level image lazy loading for the web

webFeature.description_html: The loading="lazy" attribute for <img> and <iframe> elements blocks loading the external resource until the user scrolls to that element's part of the page.
webFeature.name: Lazy-loading images and iframes

entity.name: Resource Hints
entity.description: Issues with declarative APIs for prioritizing resource loading, such as `preload`, `prefetch`, `preconnect`, and Speculation Rules.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues with declarative APIs for prioritizing resource loading, such as preload, prefetch, preconnect, and Speculation Rules.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues with declarative APIs for prioritizing resource loading, such as preload, prefetch, preconnect, and Speculation Rules.

example.codeHighlighted: <link rel="preload" href="picture.jpg" /> <link rel="dns-prefetch" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/" />

resources.title: Understanding CSS preload and other resource hints - LogRocket Blog

entity.name: Speculation Rules
entity.description: Issues with the Speculation Rules API for prerendering or prefetching navigations.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues with the Speculation Rules API for prerendering or prefetching navigations.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues with the Speculation Rules API for prerendering or prefetching navigations.

webFeature.description_html: Speculation rules are hints to the browser to proactively download pages in the background so they appear instantly when the user navigates to them.
webFeature.name: Speculation rules

entity.name: Preload
entity.description: Pain points related to using `<link rel="preload">` to fetch resources declaratively.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points related to using <link rel="preload"> to fetch resources declaratively.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to using <link rel="preload"> to fetch resources declaratively.

entity.name: Script Loading
entity.description: Pain points related to loading and executing JavaScript, including `async`, `defer`, ES modules, and dynamic imports.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points related to loading and executing JavaScript, including async, defer, ES modules, and dynamic imports.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to loading and executing JavaScript, including async, defer, ES modules, and dynamic imports.

entity.name: CSS Loading
entity.description: Issues related to loading stylesheets, including render-blocking behavior, asynchronous loading, and unused CSS.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues related to loading stylesheets, including render-blocking behavior, asynchronous loading, and unused CSS.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues related to loading stylesheets, including render-blocking behavior, asynchronous loading, and unused CSS.

entity.name: Images
entity.description: Still images across the platform, including performance issues around rendering images on a web page.
entity.descriptionHtml: Still images across the platform, including performance issues around rendering images on a web page.
entity.descriptionClean: Still images across the platform, including performance issues around rendering images on a web page.

entity.name: Responsive images
entity.description: Selecting sources by viewport/container and device characteristics, including issues around related syntax (srcset, sizes, etc)
entity.descriptionHtml: Selecting sources by viewport/container and device characteristics, including issues around related syntax (srcset, sizes, etc)
entity.descriptionClean: Selecting sources by viewport/container and device characteristics, including issues around related syntax (srcset, sizes, etc)

entity.name: SVG
entity.description: Issues related to Vector graphics via Scalable Vector Graphics, including issues related to embedding and manipulating SVG content.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues related to Vector graphics via Scalable Vector Graphics, including issues related to embedding and manipulating SVG content.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues related to Vector graphics via Scalable Vector Graphics, including issues related to embedding and manipulating SVG content.

example.codeHighlighted: <svg> <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="50" /> </svg>

webFeature.description_html: The SVG image format, represented by the <svg> element, creates two-dimensional vector graphics with declarative or scripted interaction and animation.
webFeature.name: SVG

entity.name: Ecosystem
entity.description: Ecosystem issues, poor discoverability, poor marketing.
entity.descriptionHtml: Ecosystem issues, poor discoverability, poor marketing.
entity.descriptionClean: Ecosystem issues, poor discoverability, poor marketing.

entity.name: Framework compatibility
entity.description: Issues around compatibility with JS frameworks.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around compatibility with JS frameworks.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around compatibility with JS frameworks.

entity.name: React issues
entity.description: Issues around compatibility with React.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around compatibility with React.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around compatibility with React.

entity.name: Third-party Scripts
entity.description: Issues caused by scripts not authored by the site owner, such as analytics, ads, trackers, and customer support widgets.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues caused by scripts not authored by the site owner, such as analytics, ads, trackers, and customer support widgets.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues caused by scripts not authored by the site owner, such as analytics, ads, trackers, and customer support widgets.

entity.name: Tooling
entity.description: Issues around third party tools, or lack thereof, including tooling in the browser (extensions, devtools, etc.).
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around third party tools, or lack thereof, including tooling in the browser (extensions, devtools, etc.).
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around third party tools, or lack thereof, including tooling in the browser (extensions, devtools, etc.).

entity.name: Performance profiling tools
entity.description: Issues related to choosing and using tools that measure performance or report performance issues.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues related to choosing and using tools that measure performance or report performance issues.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues related to choosing and using tools that measure performance or report performance issues.

entity.name: Lighthouse
entity.description: Issues specific to using the Lighthouse auditing tool, its recommendations, or score variability.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues specific to using the Lighthouse auditing tool, its recommendations, or score variability.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues specific to using the Lighthouse auditing tool, its recommendations, or score variability.

entity.name: Browser dev tools
entity.description: Issues around the dev tools built-in to browsers.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around the dev tools built-in to browsers.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around the dev tools built-in to browsers.

entity.name: Poor design
entity.description: Fidelity issues that are outside the developer’s control or API limitations making it hard to produce high-fidelity results. E.g. rendering is too low quality, low dpi, blurry, browser-generated UI is poor or ugly, etc.
entity.descriptionHtml: Fidelity issues that are outside the developer’s control or API limitations making it hard to produce high-fidelity results. E.g. rendering is too low quality, low dpi, blurry, browser-generated UI is poor or ugly, etc.
entity.descriptionClean: Fidelity issues that are outside the developer’s control or API limitations making it hard to produce high-fidelity results. E.g. rendering is too low quality, low dpi, blurry, browser-generated UI is poor or ugly, etc.

entity.name: Rendering
entity.description: General issues related to the browser's process of painting pixels on the screen, including layout, style recalculation, and compositing.
entity.descriptionHtml: General issues related to the browser's process of painting pixels on the screen, including layout, style recalculation, and compositing.
entity.descriptionClean: General issues related to the browser's process of painting pixels on the screen, including layout, style recalculation, and compositing.

entity.name: Virtualization / Windowing
entity.description: The need for or issues with techniques for rendering long lists or large tables by only rendering the visible items (virtual scrolling).
entity.descriptionHtml: The need for or issues with techniques for rendering long lists or large tables by only rendering the visible items (virtual scrolling).
entity.descriptionClean: The need for or issues with techniques for rendering long lists or large tables by only rendering the visible items (virtual scrolling).

entity.name: Large DOM Trees
entity.description: Performance problems caused by having a very large or complex DOM tree.
entity.descriptionHtml: Performance problems caused by having a very large or complex DOM tree.
entity.descriptionClean: Performance problems caused by having a very large or complex DOM tree.

entity.name: Excessive complexity
entity.description: The landscape or technology feels overengineered, overcomplicated, making it hard to get started.
entity.descriptionHtml: The landscape or technology feels overengineered, overcomplicated, making it hard to get started.
entity.descriptionClean: The landscape or technology feels overengineered, overcomplicated, making it hard to get started.

entity.name: Educational issues
entity.description: Lack of awareness, poor docs, lack of best practices, lack of good examples. This is about the availability and quality of educational resources, not about learnability issues instrinsic to the technology (use `poor_learnability` for that).
entity.descriptionHtml: Lack of awareness, poor docs, lack of best practices, lack of good examples. This is about the availability and quality of educational resources, not about learnability issues instrinsic to the technology (use poor_learnability for that).
entity.descriptionClean: Lack of awareness, poor docs, lack of best practices, lack of good examples. This is about the availability and quality of educational resources, not about learnability issues instrinsic to the technology (use poor_learnability for that).

entity.name: Core Web Vitals
entity.description: Pain points specifically mentioning or clearly describing metrics from the Core Web Vitals initiative.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points specifically mentioning or clearly describing metrics from the Core Web Vitals initiative.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points specifically mentioning or clearly describing metrics from the Core Web Vitals initiative.

entity.name: Cumulative Layout Shift
entity.description: Issues where the page layout unexpectedly shifts during or after loading, impacting user experience. This is a Core Web Vitals metric.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues where the page layout unexpectedly shifts during or after loading, impacting user experience. This is a Core Web Vitals metric.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues where the page layout unexpectedly shifts during or after loading, impacting user experience. This is a Core Web Vitals metric.

entity.name: Interop issues
entity.description: Browser support issues, implementation bugs, cross‑browser implementation differences or inconsistencies, browser prioritization, speed of adoption of new features, any issues where specific browsers, browser engines, or browser companies are mentioned (and it’s not to praise them).
entity.descriptionHtml: Browser support issues, implementation bugs, cross‑browser implementation differences or inconsistencies, browser prioritization, speed of adoption of new features, any issues where specific browsers, browser engines, or browser companies are mentioned (and it’s not to praise them).
entity.descriptionClean: Browser support issues, implementation bugs, cross‑browser implementation differences or inconsistencies, browser prioritization, speed of adoption of new features, any issues where specific browsers, browser engines, or browser companies are mentioned (and it’s not to praise them).

entity.descriptionHtml: Issues specific to the Google ecosystem (e.g., Chrome, Blink, Android).
entity.descriptionClean: Issues specific to the Google ecosystem (e.g., Chrome, Blink, Android).

entity.description: Issues specific to Apple as a platform or vendor, and the Apple ecosystem (e.g., Safari, WebKit, iOS).
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues specific to Apple as a platform or vendor, and the Apple ecosystem (e.g., Safari, WebKit, iOS).
entity.descriptionClean: Issues specific to Apple as a platform or vendor, and the Apple ecosystem (e.g., Safari, WebKit, iOS).

entity.descriptionHtml: Issues specific to the Safari browser, across all platforms.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues specific to the Safari browser, across all platforms.

entity.description: Issues related to UI animations across all technologies, regardless of technology used to implement them (CSS animations, Lottie, etc)
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues related to UI animations across all technologies, regardless of technology used to implement them (CSS animations, Lottie, etc)
entity.descriptionClean: Issues related to UI animations across all technologies, regardless of technology used to implement them (CSS animations, Lottie, etc)

entity.name: Debugging
entity.description: Issues around difficulty finding and eliminating bugs, regardless of the cause.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around difficulty finding and eliminating bugs, regardless of the cause.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around difficulty finding and eliminating bugs, regardless of the cause.

entity.name: End-user experience
entity.description: Issues around difficulties providing a good user experience for end-users. Do not include DX issues here (use `ergonomics` for that).
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around difficulties providing a good user experience for end-users. Do not include DX issues here (use ergonomics for that).
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around difficulties providing a good user experience for end-users. Do not include DX issues here (use ergonomics for that).

entity.description: Issues around the end-user experience around content loading
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around the end-user experience around content loading
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around the end-user experience around content loading

entity.name: FOUC
entity.description: The specific problem where content briefly appears without its intended styling, often due to CSS loading behavior.
entity.descriptionHtml: The specific problem where content briefly appears without its intended styling, often due to CSS loading behavior.
entity.descriptionClean: The specific problem where content briefly appears without its intended styling, often due to CSS loading behavior.

entity.name: Reliability
entity.description: Crashes, device/context loss, flaky behavior, and error handling.
entity.descriptionHtml: Crashes, device/context loss, flaky behavior, and error handling.
entity.descriptionClean: Crashes, device/context loss, flaky behavior, and error handling.

entity.name: Typography
entity.description: Issues related to text and font styling on the web.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues related to text and font styling on the web.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues related to text and font styling on the web.

entity.name: Fonts
entity.description: Issues related to web font loading, performance, and rendering, including Flash of Unstyled Text (FOUT) and Flash of Invisible Text (FOIT).
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues related to web font loading, performance, and rendering, including Flash of Unstyled Text (FOUT) and Flash of Invisible Text (FOIT).
entity.descriptionClean: Issues related to web font loading, performance, and rendering, including Flash of Unstyled Text (FOUT) and Flash of Invisible Text (FOIT).

entity.name: Container Queries
entity.description: Pain points related to CSS Container Queries, often in relation to other features like responsive images.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points related to CSS Container Queries, often in relation to other features like responsive images.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to CSS Container Queries, often in relation to other features like responsive images.

example.codeHighlighted: @container (min-width: 700px) { .card { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 2fr 1fr; } }

webFeature.description_html: Container size queries with the @container at-rule apply styles to an element based on the dimensions of its container.
webFeature.name: Container queries

entity.name: Reliance on JavaScript
entity.description: Lack of declarative APIs, slow rendering due to dependence on correct loading & execution of JS, issues around the higher barrier-to-entry of JS APIs, etc.
entity.descriptionHtml: Lack of declarative APIs, slow rendering due to dependence on correct loading & execution of JS, issues around the higher barrier-to-entry of JS APIs, etc.
entity.descriptionClean: Lack of declarative APIs, slow rendering due to dependence on correct loading & execution of JS, issues around the higher barrier-to-entry of JS APIs, etc.

entity.name: Workplace issues

entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around getting one’s workplace to agree on certain policies and/or priorities.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around getting one’s workplace to agree on certain policies and/or priorities.
